title: Click to close not working?
body: when I try to click the x to close the client it doesnt, and I have to go into my task menu to close league. known issue?

replies.body:
I can reproduce this 100% by disconnecting my internet and reconnecting to the game.

If it won't let you close it also won't show "masteries saved" but they will be.

Simple de-sync from server.

Closing by clicking on the bar or via task manager and it'll be fixed until you have issues next time.
Does this happen after restarting your computer? Also are you on Mac or Windows?
